Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • edu.virginia.cs.cs1110.multimedia.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelDisplay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class World
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements ModelDisplay
    Class to represent a 2d world that can hold turtles and display them Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2004
    Author:
    Barb Ericson ericson@cc.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
